name: onsuci

body.origin:
|- wcel(csuc(c0), con0)
-| wcel(c0, con0)
-| wi(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(csuc(c0), con0))
body.pretty:
⊢ suc(c0)∈ On
⊣ c0 ∈ On
⊣ (c0 ∈ On → suc(c0)∈ On)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(csuc(c0), con0)
-| wcel(c0, con0)
-| wi(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(csuc(c0), con0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ suc(c0)∈ On
⊣ c0 ∈ On
⊣ (c0 ∈ On → suc(c0)∈ On)

comment: The successor of an ordinal number is an ordinal number. Corollary 7N(c) of [Enderton] p. 193. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-1994.)
